intents.name: HelloIntent

hi
how are you
good morning
good afternoon
good evening
morning

intents.name: SunriseIntent
samples: when will the sun rise in {location}
when does the sun rise in {location}
when will the sun rise in {location} today
when does the sun rise in {location} today
when is the sunrise in {location}
what time does the sun rise in {location}
what time is the sunrise in {location}

intents.name: SunsetIntent
samples: when will the sun set in {location}
when does the sun set in {location}
when will the sun set in {location} today
when does the sun set in {location} today
when is the sunset in {location}
what time does the sun set in {location}
what time is the sunset in {location}

intents.name: DayLengthIntent
samples: how long is the day length in {location}
how long will the sun be up in {location}
for how long am I going to see the sun in {location} today
how long is the sun visible in {location} today
what is the day length in {location}
what is the daylight length in {location}
what is the sunlight length in {location}
how long is it going to be bright in {location}
how long is it going to be bright in {location} today
